text: I completely disagree with the majority of reviews. I though this was a terrific movie, great scenery, excellent acting and production, just a delight full 90 minute watch. Saskia Hampele, Liam McIntyre and Lynn Gilmartin were all excellent as the leads. Friends, this is just a wonderful movie, which you will totally enjoy.
I rated this is one a little higher than most people there because I really enjoyed it. I think you will too. Yes I recommend it James Welch, Henderson, Arkansas January 7, 2023
It is an insipid and bland movie. You can't get invested in the characters, because they're not that interesting, and the storyline and dialogue are so cliched.
Feel good simple romantic movie. Beautiful setting (Queensland).
Obviously unoriginal boring plot combined with underwhelming acting, seeking justice using beautiful scenery. This movie doesn't deserve a star at all.
